task.instruction: You are Sandra Omar (sandra.omar@systems.io) and you would like to create a new help page called 'FAQ Guide' in the General Documentation space (id: 1) using the same details as 'FAQ Template 5'. You would like to look for tutorial label and if it exists add page 157 to same label to help users find it easily.

output.name: FAQ Template 5
output.description: Frequently Asked Questions template for organizing common questions and answers by category, with search functionality and easy maintenance.
output.content:
= Frequently Asked Questions =

== General Questions ==

'''Q: What is the purpose of this system?'''
A: [Enter answer here]

'''Q: Who can access this information?'''
A: [Enter answer here]

'''Q: How do I get started?'''
A: [Enter answer here]

== Technical Questions ==

'''Q: What are the system requirements?'''
A: [Enter answer here]

'''Q: How do I troubleshoot common issues?'''
A: [Enter answer here]

'''Q: Where can I find additional documentation?'''
A: [Enter answer here]

== Support Questions ==

'''Q: How do I contact support?'''
A: [Enter answer here]

'''Q: What information should I include in a support request?'''
A: [Enter answer here]

'''Q: What are the support hours?'''
A: [Enter answer here]

== Adding New Questions ==

To add a new question:
1. Choose the appropriate category
2. Format the question in '''bold'''
3. Provide a clear, concise answer
4. Update the table of contents if needed

arguments.title: FAQ Guide
